content: --दानं {1} the gift of a cow. {2} the ceremony of tonsure or cutting the hair; अथास्य गोदानविधेरनंतरं <ls>R. 3. 33</ls>; (see Mallinātha's explanation of the word); कृतगोदानमंगलाः <ls>U. 1</ls>; (<ls>Rām.</ls> explains the word differently). {3} the part of the head close to the right ear.
